name: Winter Sports 2009: The Next Challenge
summary: Winter Sports 2009 invites you to go for records in ten main disciplines: Halfpipe Snowboarding, Alpine Skiing, Ski Jumping, Speed Skating, Biathlon, Bobsleigh, Luge, Skeleton, Figure Skating and Curling. Compete with friends by playing one after the other or by using a Split-Screen to face each other directly. Or challenge the computer and attain the highest position on the podium.
